external_games.name: Pinball FX - Star Wars Pinball: The Last Jedi

name: Pinball FX: Star Wars Pinball - The Last Jedi
summary: It's time to play Star Wars Pinball: The Last Jedi! Revisit Luke Skywalker and Rey on Ahch-To Island, and help the Resistance survive the First Order. Relive movie scenes as unique pinball action on these two beautifully crafted pinball tables!
